TemplateSQL.FixedSQL:
SET NOCOUNT ON /* 웹메뉴 조회 GetStoreWebMenuList */ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SET NOCOUNT ON /*********************************************************/ /* 매장별웹메뉴 - T_STORE_WEBMENU 조회 - SELECT QUERY */ /*********************************************************/ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SELECT A.PROJECT_SITE , A.STORE_CODE , A.MENU_CODE , A.MENU_TYPE , A.SEARCH_CODE , A.PARENT_CODE , A.LEVEL , A.SEQ , A.NAME , A.FULL_NAME , A.MENU_URL , A.TEMPLEATE_PAGE , A.MENU_CLASS , A.REMARK , A.HIDE , A.INSERT_CODE , A.INSERT_DATE , A.UPDATE_CODE , A.UPDATE_DATE FROM T_STORE_WEBMENU A
WHERE 1=1 #[PROJECT_CODE] #[STORE_CODE] #[NAME] #[HIDE] SET NOCOUNT OFF
SET NOCOUNT OFF
